from collections import *
from math import *
from queue import *
from heapq import *
t_ = int(input())
for _ in range(t_):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    Palindrome = a == a[::-1]
    sum_arr = sum(a)
    if not Palindrome and n == k:
        print('NO')
    elif n & 1 or k & 1:
        print('YES')
    elif sum_arr & 1:
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

import sys
next((f := (map(int, s.split()) for s in sys.stdin)))
for ((n, k), (*a,)) in zip(f, f):
    print('YNEOS'[~(n | k) & 1 and sum(a) & 1 if k < n else a != a[::-1]::2])

import sys
next((f := (map(int, s.split()) for s in sys.stdin)))
for ((n, k), (*a,)) in zip(f, f):
    print('YNEOS'[~(n | k) & 1 and sum(a) % 2 if k < n else a != a[::-1]::2])

import sys
next((f := (map(int, s.split()) for s in sys.stdin)))
for ((n, k), (*a,)) in zip(f, f):
    print('YNEOS'[a != a[::-1] if k == n else ~(n | k) & 1 and sum(a) % 2::2])
